DialogueDictionary.RSS_EarthCampsiteRecorder1: So for starters I have no idea how I ended up here.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_EarthCampsiteRecorder2: I'm also not entirely sure where exactly here is.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_EarthCampsiteRecorder3: Seems I'm not the only one who's been here, judging by the Nomai ruins nearby.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_EarthCampsiteRecorder4: I'll go check those out tomorrow, for now I think I deserve a little rest.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_EarthRaftRecorder1: ALLIUM: This raft was here when we arrived.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_EarthRaftRecorder2: ALLIUM: Hypothesis 1: It was left here by the original inhabitants of this planet.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_EarthRaftRecorder3: ALLIUM: Hypothesis 2: We are not the only ones to have been marooned here.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_EarthRaftRecorder4: MUSA: Unrelated hypothesis, this raft would have made our ocean crossing much easier.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_EarthRaftRecorder5: ALLIUM: I believe that is more of an objective fact than a theory, Musa.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_EuropaIntro22: As you can see, the heat from tidal forces maintains this ocean below the ice.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_EuropaIntro23: It's pretty nice here, although I do wonder what's beyond the shell.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_GarryGustavo11: Dad's at the north pole, yeah.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_GarryGustavo22: He's giant, you can't miss him.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_GarryGeysers1: Not much, just warming up by these vents.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_GarryExplore1: Well there's not much going on with Europa, most of the vents are dormant right now.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_GarryExplore2: You could go talk to Dad at the north pole though, he likes visitors.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_Gertrude11: Greetings! May the Holy Shell be with you.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_Gertrude21: Do you not know the way of the Teapot?
DialogueDictionary.RSS_Gertrude31: Goodness, you must be so lost without It!
DialogueDictionary.RSS_Gertrude32: Russell's Teapot cast The Holy Shell around the ocean to protect us from the demons of Io!
DialogueDictionary.RSS_Gertrude33: No one can disprove Russell's Teapot, for It is too small to see as It orbits somewhere between Earth and Mars.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_Gooseberry32: Why do they call it oven when you of in the cold food of out hot eat the food?
DialogueDictionary.RSS_Gooseberry33: Cookies are baked and bacon is cooked.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_Gooseberry34: Maybe the real Eye of the universe was the friends we made along the way.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_Gooseberry35: All problems can and should be solved with arson.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_Gregory11: Hey, you're from space, right? I've always wanted to see the stars.
DialogueDictionary.RSS_Gregory1A: Well they're not doing too good...
DialogueDictionary.RSS_Gregory21: Oh, well, I hope they get better soon.
